name: Fresh Fruit Warehouse
des1: This is a complete Warehouse Management application.
des2: This Warehouse provides different types of storing packages of fruits according to the demand of clients.
des3: Here various dealers can store their fruits by paying a proper rent fee.
des4: Clients can add his items updated data by logging in this site.
des5: Users can Sign Up and Sign in via email and password and directly Sign in through google.
des6: Users data is secure by Json Web Token. There is no fear of information being stolen.

name: Toolsify Manufacturer Ltd.
des1: This is the website of a tool manufacturing company that makes various tools and provides to dealers.
des2: This Manufacturer company supply different tools and collect digital payment from customers.
des3: After Signing in, the user can place an order and view his dashboard, where he can confirm this order.
des4: This Project's has the special feature for admin. Admin who are authorized to maintain to update the product's data and stores data.
des5: Users can Sign Up and Sign in via email and password and directly Sign in through google.
des6: Users data is secure by Json Web Token. There is no fear of information being stolen.

name: Healer
des1: This is the Project of a single service prvider.
des2: Here I make a project for physiotherapist who is the Healer of different people's physical pain.
des3: Physiotherapist provides different types of therapies according to the demand of clients. So, the services name and price is updated in this site.
des4: Clients can book the appointment of the physiotherapist.
des5: Clents testimonials are added which will enhance the reliability of new clients.
des6: Here users can Sign Up and Sign in via email and password and directly Sign in through google.

name: Shoes Mania
des1: This is the Product analysis web application.
des2: Here I make reveiw and display the user reviews about Nike Shoes.
des3: This Project is done by Reactjs which is very popular js library.
des4: In this project the React Router is applied which is also popular to make a Single Page Application (SPA).
des5: Rechart is used in this project to make dynamic chart to visualise the performance according to recorded data.
des6: Users testimonials are added which will enhance the reliability of new users.

name: Gadget Hero
des1: This is the Random Gadget Selector Application.
des2: It chooses gadget for the user randomly.
des3: Here have many options to choose. Users firstly select some options mainly.
des5: User provides many options and then it selects one gadget from them randomly.
des6: Users get solution to choose one from many options easily.
